pullrequest.title: Fixing issue in which publishing of messages gets stuck.

content.raw:
Hi Michael, thanks for reviewing this! Yes this issue was a bit of a head-buster :wink: Thanks also for your additional comment, it will help others who want to undertand what's going on with this transport code. I haven't added more info in the description in order to not make the text even longer and deter people from reading it at all ;-D

The code is still not nice, as you pointed out. But for same reasons you mentioned \(it would have to be re-designed\), I opted for this minimal-change patch. When migrating to `ign-transport` this will anyway be resolved.
